text:
Genomics plc | ONSITE (Oxford, UK)​

Genomics plc was launched in 2014 by four leading statistical geneticists at the University of Oxford​, and is a leading analysis company developing algorithms and software solutions to uncover the relationships between genetic variation and human disease.

We are now seeing to grow our team of developers, and have open roles for two Senior Python Developers, a Senior Web Developer, and a Data Visualisation Developer. These roles are all based in central Oxford, and further information can be found at http://www.genomicsplc.com/work-with-us/. Applications should be sent to recruitment@genomicsplc.com.
